title: Star Wars Game From Detroit: Become Human Studio!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.20.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about a possible Quantic Dream Star Wars game, Balenciaga coming to Fortnite, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:40 - Housekeeping

PS I Love You XOXO is recording today in a couple hours and it ISN’T live for Patreon supporters BUT if you have any questions about any notable PlayStation releases coming out this week, maybe write into the show with your questions before noon today.

Tomorrow Kena Stream Epic

Thursday, we’re playing World War Z: Aftermath for a sponsored stream. You can swing by at 11 am PT right after Kinda Funny Games Daily to see Greg, Mike, Andy, and Blessing blast some zombies. If you miss it live, it’ll be on our newest youtube channel youtube.com/kindafunnyplays after!

Also a reminder: It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan  & Black Jack

The Roper Report   -
00:11:00 - Could Quantic Dream be making a Star Wars game? - Jared Moore @ IGN
00:20:06 -  - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo. Independent.
00:26:05 - ATLUS is celebrating Persona’s 25th anniversary! - Nibel on Twitter
